lead_paragraph: The online payments company will allow its customers to buy and target Facebook ads and then use sales data to assess the impact of those ads.

headline.print_headline: Facebook and Square Assess Ads as a Team
headline.main: Square Teams Up With Facebook to Offer Ads That Can Be Gauged

snippet: The online payments company will allow its customers to buy and target Facebook ads and then use sales data to assess the impact of those ads.
abstract: Square announces partnership with Facebook under which small businesses using payment processing service will be able to buy and target Facebook advertising using Square software; ads bought in this way will have added benefit of sales and activity data that paint clearer picture of customer behavior online.
